ext_descriptions.ext_description: The schema_name constant specifies an uppercase representation of the name of the present Express schema.
The restrict_collection_category rule constrains every instance of of type 'collection definition' to be a definition of a of category 'collection'.
There shall not be any referenced by the attribute of_product of that is not a 'collection'.

The restrict_product_definitions_for_collection rule rule restricts the name of instances of product_definition when they are related by a product_definition_relationship with name 'collection membership'.
The name of the relating product_definition shall be 'part definition'. In addition, this product definition shall have an associated definition context with name 'collection definition'.
The name of the related product_definition shall be 'part occurrence'.
There shall not be any instance of with name 'collection membership', for which the name of the related instances of product_definition does not match the constraint mentioned above.
